infoArray.name: showDialogMessages
infoArray.desc: To show or hide dialog messages. Default true.

infoArray.name: canGetOnlineInfoMoreThanOne
infoArray.desc: To make online search more than one in same session. Default false.

infoArray.name: isTextAndButtonsEnabled
infoArray.desc: To enable input field and search button. Default true.

infoArray.name: isVisibileAddressInfoTab
infoArray.desc: To show address tab in Dialog. Default false.

infoArray.name: isVisibileSearchAndClearButton
infoArray.desc: To show search and clear button. Default true.

infoArray.name: isVisibileSearchOnlineButton
infoArray.desc: To show online search button. Default false.

infoArray.name: showBlackListDialogMessages
infoArray.desc: To show Black List Dialog messages. Default false.

infoArray.name: isBlackListReadonly
infoArray.desc: To make Black List Dialog is readonly. Default false.

infoArray.name: isReadOnly
infoArray.desc: To make component is readonly. Default false.

infoArray.name: searchBehaviourType
infoArray.desc: Defines the component's search behaviour. Can be defined only as 'All','SearchForRealPerson' and 'SearchForCorporate'

infoArray.name: lostFocus
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the text field losts focus

infoArray.name: clearClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the text field is cleared

infoArray.name: searchClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the search button is clicked.

infoArray.name: selectedMernisInfoChanged
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the selected mernis information is changed.

infoArray.name: selectedMernisInfoCleared
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the selected mernis information is cleared.

infoArray.name: recordCouldntFind
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the search returns no record.

infoArray.name: mernisNotHealty
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when an error occured because of the mernis service.
